name: One Pot Vegetable Rice with Bell Pepper and Peas
description: This one pot vegetable rice with bell pepper and peas is ready in only 20 minutes. It's super healthy and so yummy! You can either eat it just by itself or it also makes a great side dish!
recipeIngredient: 1  red bell pepper, cut into small pieces
1/2 cup vegan chorizo, cut into cubes (optional)
1/2 cup chopped fresh parsley, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a pot and sauté the onion for about 2-3 minutes or until it becomes translucent. Add the garlic and the red bell pepper. Cook for one more minute. Then add the rice, the ajvar, the paprika powder, and the vegetable broth.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a pot and sauté the onion for about 2-3 minutes or until it becomes translucent. Add the garlic and the red bell pepper. Cook for one more minute. Then add the rice, the ajvar, the paprika powder, and the vegetable broth.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for 15 minutes (without the lid). Then add the frozen peas and cook for 5 more minutes. 2 minutes before the cooking time is over, stir in the green onions and the vegan chorizo (if using).
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for 15 minutes (without the lid). Then add the frozen peas and cook for 5 more minutes. 2 minutes before the cooking time is over, stir in the green onions and the vegan chorizo (if using).

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Sprinkle with fresh parsley.
